original_title: Sports Minister greenlights Sri Lanka’s ODI squad for Afghanistan series
original_body_lines: Colombo, Feb. 8 (Daily Mirror) - Minister of Sports and Youth Affairs Harin Fernando has approved the 16-member squad selected by the Sri Lanka Cricket Selection Committee to participate in the ODI series against Afghanistan.
Former captain Dasun Shanaka has been excluded from the squad, while all-rounder Chamika Karunaratne has been included.
The ODI series is scheduled to commence on February 9th in Pallekele.
